data.message:
Hip hop needs more of these kinds of tracks.  Wish he would've filled the V disc with work like this instead of a bunch of radio singles that got played out and weren't that good to begin with...

Edit: He even says he'd rather make "Not Afraid 2" than another "We Made You" and then fills the classic disc with stuff like "Purple Pills" and "Wanksta"... SMH... I wish the label would get off his ass and he could just do some real shit for the true fans.
